definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.chinese: 她于下午5时产下孪生儿。

sentences.english: Female tigers in the wild can live up to 15 years averagely.
sentences.chinese: 野生雌虎的寿命大约是15年，平均能产下5窝虎仔。

sentences.english: Male boas were available to the boa mother and she had previously given birth to other snake litters by mating with males.
sentences.chinese: 她有雄伴，之前也曾通过交配产下其它小蛇。

sentences.english: Rain and cool temperature will kill many of the eggs the grasshoppers are laying today.
sentences.chinese: 雨水和冷凉的气温能破坏蝗虫现在产下的许多卵。

sentences.english: Ichthyosaurs and other contemporary viviparous species, by contrast, gave birth to multiple offspring.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，鱼龙和其他现代胎生的物种产下多个幼崽。

sentences.english: To realize the value of nine months. Ask a monther who gave birth a still born.
sentences.chinese: 想要懂得九个月的价值，去问一位产下死婴的母亲。

sentences.english: In its lifetime, a female ladybug will lay as many as 2, 000 eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在雌性瓢虫的一生中将产下多达2000枚的卵。

sentences.english: The hybrid child of a murderous utopia and a disenchanted époque.
sentences.chinese: 血腥凶残的乌托邦和幻灭的时代产下了混血儿。
我的狗产下一窝不足月的狗仔。

sentences.english: The breeding pair and any offspring are the property of China.
sentences.chinese: 这对繁殖后代的熊猫及其产下的幼崽都归中国所有。

sentences.english: Soon she becomes pregnant and births an illegitimate girl .
sentences.chinese: 没多久珍妮怀了孕，产下一非婚生的小女儿。

sentences.english: The second largest mare has just given birth to a foal.
sentences.chinese: 第二大的母驴刚刚产下一只小驴。

sentences.english: She gave birth to a girl last night.
His baby girl was conceived through artificial insemination using donor sperm and Beatie's own eggs.
sentences.chinese: 用捐赠者的精子和比提的卵子经过人工授精产下女婴。

sentences.english: In a patch of velvety moss, a black snake, called a racer, leaves her eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在一团毛绒绒的的苔藓里，美洲黑蛇产下了卵。

sentences.english: Next to the woman is a dragon that is ready to devour the child she is giving birth to.
sentences.chinese: 在女人身边有一条戾龙正准备吞下她将要产下的婴儿。

definition: to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
to be born/arrival of newborn/birth (of a savior or religious leader)
(of an expectant mother) to be in labor
to be the parent of (a child)
